pages.text: $(bold)Relics$()$(br)$(br)Adds special unique items, such as charms and accessories, that augment the player with special abilities. Relics come in different rarities and can be upgraded.
$(bold)Artifacts$()$(br)$(br)Much like relics, adds items that augment the player with unique abilities.
$(bold)Ars Nouveau$()$(br)$(br)A magic mod inspired by Ars Magicka that allows players to craft their own spells, create magical artifacts, and perform rituals.

$(bold)Occultism$()$(br)$(br)A ritual magic system centered around summoning spirits. Offers options for automation, storage, creating powerful tools and jewelry, commanding familiars, controlling demons to mine in void dimensions, and more.
$(bold)Hexerei$()$(br)$(br)A mod that lets you concoct items using a mixing cauldron, store items in coffers, store herbs in herb jars, light up areas with colored candles, and more.

$(bold)Iron's Spells 'n Spellbooks$()$(br)$(br)A mod focused on learning and upgrading spells. The mod is designed to be simple, allowing anyone to use powerful spells without large investment into tedious details.
The guidebook to Iron's Spells 'n Spellbooks.
